1.title: The Tandyman
1.plot: Caroline and Liam catch a burglar in their kitchen and lock him in a cupboard before discovering he is unpopular old school fellow Dave Tandy. To their surprise he wants them charged for assault and they have to do a deal with him as well as tackling precocious Mega,daughter Chloe's friend who insists they adopt her. Jim and his other son Kevin engage in a dispute over which of them caught a huge fish with Kevin finally getting his own back on his father.

2.title: Liam Flynn, Party Legend
2.plot: The Flynns host a fortieth anniversary party for Caroline's parents pat and Alan,who have come over from Spain,spouting all the cliches Jim anticipated. When Pat lets slip to Chloe that her parents married because Caroline was pregnant with her the girl sulks in her room but Liam and Caroline convince her that they married for love. Kevin spends the party trying to avoid Amy,with whom he had sex at a funeral,until he realises that they are after the same thing.

3.title: Life Is Sweat
3.plot: When work-mate Julie asks Liam to be her paid personal trainer he sets up a gym in his garage with his sons and Kevin as reluctant clients. However the family have to point out to him that Julie is more interested in his body than his professional skills. Kevin over-reacts to being dumped by a girlfriend and Jim's efforts to mediate do not have the desired effect whilst Liam tires of his mother-in-law's new toy, a Webcam with which she is constantly interrupting him from Spain.

4.title: You're Only Young Twice
4.plot: Liam attempts to prove that he is still young at heart by going out drinking every night with Kevin and his football friends but ends up embarrassing them and himself before realising he should act his age. Jim presents Caroline and Liam with a hideous portrait of them that he painted at his art class but,after they have destroyed it,admits he only did it in revenge for their nagging him to take up a hobby. However there is a worse painting to come.

5.title: Secrets and Wives
5.plot: When Ted from next door goes away he gives the house keys to Liam,who cannot resist going in for a snoop. After finding a couple in bed he goes back for a second look but falls and hurts his neck,lying to Caroline that he injured it at work. Kevin,whilst blackmailing his brother to let him run extra Maths,or rather horse race betting,coaching welshes to Caroline,who plays along by insisting Liam sue for compensation - until he confesses. Jim worries that a theft from work many years ago may now come to light and is saved when the firm goes into administration.

6.title: Frozen Assets
6.plot: When the boiler breaks down the Flynns cannot afford to repair it and have to make economies whilst they shiver. Dean,a boy who wants to date Chloe,says he will mend it if she dates him but Liam decides against it. Meanwhile Caroline helps Jim get a job as a hotel doorman but his over-familiar attitude gets him sacked. He does however offer to pay for the repair of the boiler - though at a price.

1.title: Santorini
1.plot: Married as teenagers Caroline and Liam,now thirty-somethings, have to cope with their own brood's problems - teen-aged Chloe's piercings,Steve's being bullied at school and Mikey's eating food out of bins. Liam's slacker brother Tommy is a useless child minder as the couple work extra shifts to afford a holiday in Santorini and then they have to tell Liam's father Jim that the woman he's dating is a nun. Somehow it looks as if they may end up in a caravan on the rain-swept coast and not Santorini.

2.title: The Birthday Treat
2.plot: It's Caroline's thirty-second birthday and Liam is taking her to see Mamma Mia! on stage. Jim and Tommy have both come to baby-sit but Jim wants to use the kids to lick envelopes for him and Tommy is out of food whilst Liam is obsessed with apologising to Chloe's boyfriend Wayne,whom he attacked with a takeaway after seeing them kissing. With so many setbacks it looks as if the only Mamma Mia! Caroline will be seeing is on a DVD at home.

3.title: The Hardest Cut
3.plot: Liam goes for a vasectomy but,put off by Tommy's horror stories about botched operations,bottles out. Caroline finds out from the hospital and goes with him to make sure he has it done but then starts to have doubts of her own. Jim and Tommy's efforts to teach Mikey morality by returning a toy gun he has stolen to the shop only cause more trouble whilst Chloe falls for Peter, the boy who serves her pizza, because of the romantic way he asks for her order.

4.title: Wild at Heart
4.plot: Jim is outraged to find that Chloe has a fake I.D. card and accuses Liam of taking it too lightly until it seems that she is using it to go to a rave. Liam and Tommy go after her but end up in a Turkish restaurant with no sign of Chloe and next morning it transpires that she was only visiting a friend. The truly dishonest person however is Tommy,who has to return the signed celebrity photographs he stole from the restaurant.

5.title: Guitar
5.plot: After the brothers are left a legacy Liam buys a Les Paul guitar,incurring the wrath of Chloe who wanted him to spend the money on her school skiing trip. Tommy loses the envelope containing his cash though Jim is teaching him a lesson and has to learn one himself after trying to steal his best friend's girl. Ultimately Liam must return the guitar. After all the washing machine needs replacing - but at least his love life become legendary after Mikey walks in on his parents' afternoon delight and tells the whole school.

6.title: Whistleblowing
6.plot: Liam is appalled by the family's dishonesty,Caroline telling a friend Jim is terminally ill so she can go to the hairdresser and not take the kids swimming, Tommy moving in to escape a supposedly crazed girlfriend purely because he is avoiding commitment with a nice ordinary girl and Jim forcing Mikey to sign up for football,rather than dance lessons and cheating in his capacity as referee to give Mikey confidence. But when Jim's chicanery has worked too well and Mikey's confidence has become insufferable it's dance classes for the pair of them.

locations: Teddington Studios, Teddington, Middlesex, England, UK::(studio)
imdb.title: In with the Flynns
plot: It's about a family from Manchester and their every day lives and the funny things that happen to them, mostly revolving around Will Mellor and his wife.
